title: Ride Hard Cowboy
description: When Jake Channing hired a country singer to entertain at his gay club, he just wanted to give his guests a taste of Nashville. What he didn't expect was to be blown away by the hottest bachelor in country music. Riley Edge was a rising country superstar who had begun to work his way into the hearts of the South. When asked to play a private event at the most popular gay club in Nashville, he couldn't pass up the opportunity to expand his fan base. He didn't know he would find himself in the bed of the unlikeliest of lovers. He also had no idea it would turn his life and his career upside down. After all, fame, sex and scandals come at a steep price.
author: Jemma McKenzie
